description:
Ice is a Level 2 Akuma who attempted to help http://anidb.net/ch32757 [Road Kamelot] locate http://anidb.net/ch7368 [Miranda Lotto]`s Innocence.
Ice stands on two bulky, arm-like appendages and has no body below his torso, a key occupying the space where his legs should be. He has long hair with some pulled into a curled ponytail on the top of his head, and a wide smile filled with crooked teeth. When his powers a fully released, his "Ice Fire" makes his entire body burst into flames.
Like all Akuma, Ice is bloodthirsty, but he is also shown to be a little simpleminded, playing "Rock, Paper, Scissors" with his comrades to decide how to kill http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen].
He was shown to be terrified when Road gave him the order to self-destruct, though he obeyed anyway, having no choice. As he died, his soul reached out to Allen, begging for help.
Source: D.Gray-man Wiki
name: Ice
